languages.text: Застарелый погрузчик едва справляется с положенными функциями, но блюстители все еще предпочитают многоступенчатое техобслуживание труду дремучих криворуких бедняков.
The timeworn loader is barely fit for purpose at this point, but the enforcers still see its complex maintenance as the lesser evil compared to hiring ignorant, clumsy scroungers to do the job.
languages.original_text: Застарелый погрузчик едва справляется с положенными функциями, но блюстители все еще предпочитают многоступенчатое техобслуживание труду дремучих криворуких бедняков.

traits.locale_text: The timeworn loader is barely fit for purpose at this point, but the enforcers still see its complex maintenance as a lesser evil than hiring ignorant, clumsy poor folk to do the job.

languages.text: La vieja cargadora apenas puede cumplir ya con su función, pero los guardias consideran su complejo mantenimiento un mal menor frente a la opción de contratar a gorrones ignorantes y torpes para hacer su trabajo.
languages.original_text: The timeworn loader is barely fit for purpose at this point, but the enforcers still see its complex maintenance as the lesser evil compared to hiring ignorant, clumsy scroungers to do the job.

traits.locale_text: La vieja cargadora apenas puede cumplir ya con su función, pero los guardias consideran su complejo mantenimiento un mal menor frente a la opción de contratar a gorrones ignorantes y torpes para hacer su trabajo.

languages.text: 使い古されたローダーは今のところかろうじて使用に耐えるものだ。エンフォーサーたちは、無知で不器用な清掃員を雇うことに比べれば、その複雑なメンテナンスのほうがまだマシだと考えている。
languages.original_text: The timeworn loader is barely fit for purpose at this point, but the enforcers still see its complex maintenance as the lesser evil compared to hiring ignorant, clumsy scroungers to do the job.

traits.locale_text: 使い古されたローダーは今のところかろうじて使用に耐えるものだ。エンフォーサーたちは、無知で不器用な清掃員を雇うことに比べれば、その複雑なメンテナンスのほうがまだマシだと考えている。

languages.text: 这台老旧的装载机几乎完全不适合这项工作，但执法者认为两害相侵取其轻。与其雇佣无知、笨拙的流民来做这项工作，还不如维护这台老旧的机器。
languages.original_text: The timeworn loader is barely fit for purpose at this point, but the enforcers still see its complex maintenance as the lesser evil compared to hiring ignorant, clumsy scroungers to do the job.

traits.locale_text: 这台老旧的装载机几乎完全不适合这项工作，但执法者认为两害相侵取其轻。与其雇佣无知、笨拙的流民来做这项工作，还不如维护这台老旧的机器。

languages.text: Der abgenutzte Lader ist kaum noch betriebsbereit, aber die Enforcers halten seine komplexe Wartung noch immer für das geringere Übel, verglichen mit der Einstellung dummer, ungeschickter Schnorrer für die Aufgabe.
languages.original_text: The timeworn loader is barely fit for purpose at this point, but the enforcers still see its complex maintenance as the lesser evil compared to hiring ignorant, clumsy scroungers to do the job.

traits.locale_text: Der abgenutzte Lader ist kaum noch betriebsbereit, aber die Enforcers halten seine komplexe Wartung noch immer für das geringere Übel, verglichen mit der Einstellung dummer, ungeschickter Schnorrer für die Aufgabe.

languages.text: Le débardeur usé par le temps est à peine fonctionnel à ce stade, mais les prévôts considèrent toujours son entretien pourtant complexe comme un moindre mal par rapport à l'embauche de parasites ignorants et maladroits.
languages.original_text: The timeworn loader is barely fit for purpose at this point, but the enforcers still see its complex maintenance as the lesser evil compared to hiring ignorant, clumsy scroungers to do the job.

traits.locale_text: Le débardeur usé par le temps est à peine fonctionnel à ce stade, mais les prévôts considèrent toujours son entretien pourtant complexe comme un moindre mal par rapport à l'embauche de parasites ignorants et maladroits.

languages.text: Zamanla yıpranmış yükleyici, şu noktada amacını zar zor yerine getiriyor. Ancak infazcılar, işi yapacak cahil ve sakar otlakçıları işe almaya kıyasla yükleyicinin karmaşık bakımını kötünün iyisi olarak görmeye devam ediyor.
languages.original_text: The timeworn loader is barely fit for purpose at this point, but the enforcers still see its complex maintenance as the lesser evil compared to hiring ignorant, clumsy scroungers to do the job.
